data.taskTitle: in tasksactive what is this marginright?
summary: Identified source of margin-right appearance in TasksActive
The space is from fixed table column width (260px CSS), not an explicit margin
findings: No margin-right property is set on any element
The td-task column has fixed width: 260px set in CSS (line 1112)
Shorter task IDs have more empty space because the column width accommodates longer IDs like steelbridge-oy3.2
This is pure CSS (table-layout: fixed + column width), not Tailwind
recommendedActions: If narrower column desired, reduce the 260px value in .th-task, .td-task CSS
Alternative: use width: auto for flexible columns (may cause table layout shifts)
